articles.title: Ban of ineffective phenylephrine could affect access to other remedies - UPI News
articles.description: America's most popular cold medications contain a nasal decongestant that doesn't work, creating a knotty dilemma for regulators, a new study reports.
articles.content:
America's most popular cold medications contain a nasal decongestant that doesn't work, creating a knotty dilemma for regulators, a new study reports.

articles.title: Nikki Haley says ‘smart’ India doesn't trust US: ‘I have talked with Modi…’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: In an interview, Indian-American US president aspirant Nikki Haley said as of now India sees the United States as weak. | World News
articles.content: Nikki Haley, an aspiring Republican presidential candidate, claimed that India wants to be a partner with the US, but as of now, it doesn't trust Americans to lead. Nikki Haley added that India has p… [+1965 chars]
